text: The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog. This sentence contains every letter of the English alphabet.
Machine learning is a powerful tool for pattern recognition and prediction in large datasets.
The history of artificial intelligence dates back to the 1950s when Alan Turing proposed the famous Turing Test.
Deep learning models use neural networks with multiple layers to learn complex patterns in data.
Natural language processing enables computers to understand, interpret, and generate human language.
